title: WHY YOU DO THIS

embed.description: Below, you'll find the minimum system requirements for running League of Legends on PCs and Macs. Windows Mac Minimum Specs Recommended Specs Optimal H...

replies.body: Simply deleting files without the proper uninstallation methods can end up causing issues and leaving your PC confused.  I suggest downloading our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to help with a clean reinstall and removal of the client.  Any future installations should be done through the[ official download ](https://signup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload)site to make sure that everything goes accordingly, versus issues that could be caused by deleting, modifying, or transferring files.  I hope that helps!

> [{quoted}](name=PeterPan01,realm=OCE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=WPbEKtav,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-09-21T15:31:44.231+0000)
>
> So i was cleaning my computer by deleting Some files  and one of them was Riot games that had league of legends  in it.  After realizing the shite mistake i made i went to re download it again to see this [ The older version of league of Legends cannot be removed. Contact your technical support group] Now after seeing that i went on youtube too see how to delete LoL off my computer fully so i can fully re download it , but did you think it worked ?{{champion:32}} No this came up [ The feature you are trying to use is on a network resource that is unavailable. [ Click OK to try again, or enter an altemate path to a folder containing the installation package &quot;LOL.OC1.msi&#039; in the box below] I spent 1 hour look for it, i never found it because i deleted it but my computer was processing that it was still on my computer so if i wanted to delete LoL just show me the file that had LoL in it but the file was gone! and the &quot;old version &quot; that was not letting me redownload was because the file save on my program and Features.
> 
> Sorry if this Dos not make any sense my English is shit* and this is what im under standing of this.
> Im getting the LOL that i have download on my family computer and putting it on my USB and file by file moving it on my computer and get LOL on my computer again that way. Im hoping it works if not i can give the Uninstall a go again and show i got the files and pray it works. {{champion:26}}

its 1:31 AM
